Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima explored the land that she came to. So perfect, prestine, full of 
life... it was odd. But at the moment, nothing seemed to matter or make sense. She 
was just... here. Her whole existance seemed to be in limbo, her memory 
currently short circuited, ... in otherwords.. she had amnesia. She couldn't 
remember a thing. however, ... she could feel. She felt tired & weak. Also, feeling 
that a part of her was sad & aching for something. Unsure what it was. 

As she strode along, coming to a clearing where her optics beheld a waterfall 
& a lagoon. Cocking her head to the side, she gazed at it curiously. Then 
moved up to it. As she looked into it, it showed her then as the breeze moved 
across it it showed her a different reflection. 

"Whaaa!" Jumping back. Stunned for a moment. Then leaning back over the 
waters to see her reflection of her battered body. Seeing it she felt the dull 
aches & pains. What were they from?   

-Leave this place! A familiar voice echoed. Tell Rodimus I will speak with 
him-  the voice again echoed.

She gazed at the waterfall, as the roar of the water hypnotized her. Rodimus, 
the name was ... familiar to her. But.. how? Who was he? How did she know 
this... Rodimus? 

She knelt at the water's edge, leaned over the waters again, her face up to 
the water's surface. The water though, seemed to sparkle as a breeze washed 
over it again. She then took a taste. It wasn't just water.. it was... energy! 
The energy surged through her reviving her. She smiled as she slipped into the 
water. enveloping her, causing energy to surge through her.... & to the Matrix 
within her. Swimming in it's waters, memories rushed to her, visions of the 
past, faces of bots she had cared deeply for, had given her loyalty to: 
Soundwave, Thundercracker, Skywarp, Nightbird, Scream, Solaris.. so many faces... then 
another who she remembered, Gamma, her mentor... & .. another whom she cared 
so deeply for... Megatron... visions of him,... Cybertron.. the Ark... the 
Heart of Cybertron.. the Matrix of Leadership.. Unicron... Quints... Golden 
Age... everything was so fast, she barely recognized it. 

The past memories then mixed with the present.. of a lion, a battle with a 
orange/red car, of a face of a fembot, a group of Decepticons... then.. of a 
kiss. A face... My sweet tigress, it echoed... 

Then the present gave way to the future, with Cybertron... few of either 
side.. a battle with Flarea, daughter of Optimus Prime & Elita -1... of a battle 
for Leadership... then her holding a Matrix releasing the power as the light 
flooded her. 

She stiffened in the water as light enveloped her. 

Shooting to the surface, she nearly shot out of the waters as her feathery 
mane flung back in a fantastic, erotic display. Her crimson optics glowed. As 
she then bobbed & all calmed down. The visions confused her.. but they will be 
answered in time. 

Making her way to the waterfall, she then stood under it. The water shimmered 
with her form as the golden sun washed over her like the water.  

--part1_1ca.b1de320.2c113f53_boundary
